scripts.logs: pipenv run chalice logs --profile ashwin-cff-lambda --stage beta > chalice.log
scripts.logs-prod: pipenv run chalice logs --profile ashwin-cff-lambda --stage prod > chalice.log
scripts.start-prod: cross-env AWS_PROFILE=ashwin-cff-lambda DEV_COGNITO_IDENTITY_ID=cm:cognitoUserPool:f31c1cb8-681c-4d3e-9749-d7c074ffd7f6 pipenv run chalice local --stage prod --port=8001
scripts.start: cross-env AWS_PROFILE=ashwin-cff-lambda DEV_COGNITO_IDENTITY_ID=f31c1cb8-681c-4d3e-9749-d7c074ffd7f6 pipenv run chalice local --stage dev --port=8001
scripts.deploy: cross-env AWS_PROFILE=ashwin-cff-lambda pipenv run chalice deploy --profile ashwin-cff-lambda --stage beta
scripts.deploy-prod: cross-env AWS_PROFILE=ashwin-cff-lambda pipenv run chalice deploy --profile ashwin-cff-lambda --stage prod
scripts.test: cross-env DEV_COGNITO_IDENTITY_ID=id MODE=TEST pipenv run python -m unittest
